程序包 org.janusgraph.core.schema

接口 SchemaManager

所有超级接口:
SchemaInspector
所有已知子接口:
JanusGraph, JanusGraphManagement, JanusGraphTransaction, Transaction
所有已知实现类:
JanusGraphBlueprintsGraph, JanusGraphBlueprintsTransaction, ManagementSystem, StandardJanusGraph, StandardJanusGraphTx
public interface SchemaManager
extends SchemaInspector
作者:
Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    EdgeLabel addConnection​(EdgeLabel edgeLabel, VertexLabel outVLabel, VertexLabel inVLabel)
    Add a constraint on which vertices the given edge label can connect.
    EdgeLabel addProperties​(EdgeLabel edgeLabel, PropertyKey... keys)
    Add property constraints for a given edge label.
    VertexLabel addProperties​(VertexLabel vertexLabel, PropertyKey... keys)
    Add property constraints for a given vertex label.
    EdgeLabelMaker makeEdgeLabel​(String name)
    Returns a EdgeLabelMaker instance to define a new EdgeLabel with the given name.
    PropertyKeyMaker makePropertyKey​(String name)
    Returns a PropertyKeyMaker instance to define a new PropertyKey with the given name.
    VertexLabelMaker makeVertexLabel​(String name)
    Returns a VertexLabelMaker to define a new vertex label with the given name.

    从接口继承的方法 org.janusgraph.core.schema.SchemaInspector

    containsEdgeLabel, containsPropertyKey, containsRelationType, containsVertexLabel, getEdgeLabel, getOrCreateEdgeLabel, getOrCreatePropertyKey, getOrCreatePropertyKey, getOrCreatePropertyKey, getOrCreateVertexLabel, getPropertyKey, getRelationType, getVertexLabel

  • 方法详细资料

    • makePropertyKey

      PropertyKeyMaker makePropertyKey​(String name)
      Returns a PropertyKeyMaker instance to define a new PropertyKey with the given name. By defining types explicitly (rather than implicitly through usage) one can control various aspects of the key and associated consistency constraints.

      The key constructed with this maker will be created in the context of this transaction.

      返回:
      a PropertyKeyMaker linked to this transaction.
      另请参阅:
      PropertyKeyMaker, PropertyKey

    • makeEdgeLabel

      EdgeLabelMaker makeEdgeLabel​(String name)
      Returns a EdgeLabelMaker instance to define a new EdgeLabel with the given name. By defining types explicitly (rather than implicitly through usage) one can control various aspects of the label and associated consistency constraints.

      The label constructed with this maker will be created in the context of this transaction.

      返回:
      a EdgeLabelMaker linked to this transaction.
      另请参阅:
      EdgeLabelMaker, EdgeLabel

    • makeVertexLabel

      VertexLabelMaker makeVertexLabel​(String name)
      Returns a VertexLabelMaker to define a new vertex label with the given name. Note, that the name must be unique.
      参数:
      name -
      返回:

    • addProperties

      VertexLabel addProperties​(VertexLabel vertexLabel, PropertyKey... keys)
      Add property constraints for a given vertex label.
      参数:
      vertexLabel - to which the constraints applies.
      keys - defines the properties which should be added to the VertexLabel as constraints.
      返回:
      a VertexLabel edited which contains the added constraints.

    • addProperties

      EdgeLabel addProperties​(EdgeLabel edgeLabel, PropertyKey... keys)
      Add property constraints for a given edge label.
      参数:
      edgeLabel - to which the constraints applies.
      keys - defines the properties which should be added to the EdgeLabel as constraints.
      返回:
      a EdgeLabel edited which contains the added constraints.

    • addConnection

      EdgeLabel addConnection​(EdgeLabel edgeLabel, VertexLabel outVLabel, VertexLabel inVLabel)
      Add a constraint on which vertices the given edge label can connect.
      参数:
      edgeLabel - to which the constraint applies.
      outVLabel - specifies the outgoing vertex for this connection.
      inVLabel - specifies the incoming vertex for this connection.
      返回:
      a EdgeLabel edited which contains the added constraint.
